channel.title: dev on MatrixCore
channel.description: Recent content in dev on MatrixCore

item.title: Dev Blog 01
item.description: After writing some code for MatrixCore, MatrixSQLiteStore and nio/matrixcore-sqlite, I decided I should start a blog. Deciding on a Database Rewriting the database code 1, 2, or 3 times I started the MatrixCore database code based on Apples Core Data framework. This did integrate nicely into SwiftUI as it provides a special viewContext, which is designed to be used for UI requests. But the class hierarchies CoreData uses is not that good suited to store chat messages.
